dublin_core.dcvalue: Chronic wounds are a major healthcare crisis presenting challenges for home health agencies lacking specially trained staff to properly monitor and manage these wounds Consequently the home health industry needs to improve wound management methods and technologies to properly care for patients with chronic wounds Saint Francis University s Center of Excellence for Remote and Medically Under Served Areas partnered with a home health agency University of Pittsburgh Medical Center Lee Regional Community Nursing Service to identify a solution to this problem
In-home wound care management utilizing information technology.
